name: elucidate
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to explain something or make something clear: I don't understand. You'll have to elucidate. The reasons for the change in weather conditions have been elucidated by several scientists. Synonyms
clarify (EXPLAIN)
explainOpposite
obfuscate formal
